**Insurance Claims**

# Insurance Claim Lawyer in Conroe

## Dedicated to Helping Accident Victims Get Their Fair Share

After a car accident or other life-disrupting event, medical bills and other
expenses can really add up. Although you may be fully insured, it’s a sad fact
that many of the popular big-name insurance companies are more interested in
increasing shareholder profits than they are in paying out on legitimate
insurance claims for loyal policyholders.

For many of us, the time after an accident or other loss can be stressful and
unsettling enough. Having to find your insurance company less-than-helpful
when you need them the most will add further unnecessary stress.

Whether you’ve been denied coverage for a so-called “exclusion” or your
insurance company isn’t willing to honor coverage that you’ve faithfully paid
for, it’s a good idea to speak with a Conroe insurance claim attorney about
your case.

The only way to make sure your insurance company is acting in good faith is to
have an insurance claim attorney review your actual policy.

**Contact Scott Law Firm today to begin with a free consultation. We can
review your policy and help you seek a fair payout.**

### Auto Policies & Car Accident Claims

Car accidents can leave victims in the hospital and out of work for extended
periods of time. Although we like to hope that our insurance adjusters are
quick to rush in and give us the compensation we deserve, it can take weeks,
months, or longer for some policies to payout.

In the meantime, hospital bills are piling up, family members are missing
work, and there’s no telling how long it will be until you’re back on your
feet. If insurance companies act in bad faith by delaying or denying claims,
it’s a good idea to have a lawyer review your policy and make sure you’re
getting treated fairly.

### Homeowners' Claims

Many well-known homeowner’s insurance companies are notorious for denying
coverage on righteous claims. Whether you’re recovering from storm damage or
the faulty work of a contractor, you should be given the coverage promised in
your homeowner's insurance policy.

Wrongful denial of benefits from a roof claim or some other type of storm or
fire damage can seriously delay your ability to safely live in your home and
get on with your life. A lawyer can review your entire policy and make sure
the insurance company is acting in good faith and lives up to all coverage
promises made in the policy.

### Life Insurance Claims

Losing a loved one, no matter what the circumstances, is a traumatic event for
families. The one thing you should be able to count on is your life insurance
company coming through on the policy.

When insurance companies try to claim an exclusion in coverage after the death
of a loved one, get in touch with an insurance claim attorney immediately.

### Is Your Insurance Company Going to Take Care of You?

Many Americans think that because they pay their insurance premiums, insurance
companies will be helpful and be there for them when they need them.
Unfortunately, that isn’t always the case. In fact, many popular big-name
insurance companies have documented histories of denying and delaying claims.

Insurance companies often deny and delay claims in an effort to get out of
paying out policies. Many of these companies are more interested in their
bottom line than paying out on legitimate claims.

The American Association for Justice (AAJ) completed a comprehensive and
exhaustive investigation that included thousands of court documents, SEC and
FBI records, complaint reports and testimony and depositions from former
insurance adjusters from around the nation to find and rate the worst
insurance companies in the U.S. This study found that some of the worst were
Allstate and AIG, among others.

### When to Call an Insurance Claim Attorney in Conroe, Texas

If you suspect that your insurance company isn’t treating you fairly. Have an
insurance claim attorney in Conroe review your case. Holding insurance
companies accountable for the coverage they’ve promised is essential for
moving forward and getting on with your life.

**At theScott Law Firm, initial consultations are always free. You don’t pay
anything unless we recover compensation for you. Call us at (936) 243-4299 for
a free consultation and case evaluation.**
